# Editor User Interface

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/getting-to-know-the-user-interface-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T22:55:35.207823

---

The better you know the user interface, the faster you can work. Get your basic UI commands down, then move on to ways to navigate faster and more easily!

If you've used Unreal Engine before, you'll find the UI is already familiar. But even if you're new to UEFN, the docs here will get you up to speed quickly.

[![User Interface Reference](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/fd7e907f-30fc-4595-87e5-f92ac19b80a9?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)
